entry.value: Mobile Access Reviews, Mobile Approvals, Forms

RoleTypeDefinition.name: organizational
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a collection of roles that typically correspond to departments or business units within an organizational hierarchy.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: business
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a collection of users that perform similar functions within the organization. Business Roles are associated with IT Roles or Entitlement Roles to provide specific levels of access to enterprise IT resources.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: it
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a collection of IT entitlements which can be associated with Business Roles to provide users with specific access rights. IT Roles can be constrained to entitlements within a single application or expanded to include entitlements across applications.

RoleTypeDefinition.name: entitlement
RoleTypeDefinition.Description: Defines a single IT entitlement necessary to access data or perform a specific action within a target system.

MessageTemplate.name: Policy Violation Details
MessageTemplate.Text: A violation of policy '$policyName' rule '$constraintName' was detected on user '$identityName'.

FilterTemplate.FilterString: #if($parts.size() == 1) firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") || lastname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") || name.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") || displayName.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") #elseif($parts.size() == 2) (firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)") && lastname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(1)")) || (firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(1)") && lastname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0)")) || displayName.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0) $parts.get(1)") || firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0) $parts.get(1)") || name.startsWithIgnoreCase("$parts.get(0) $parts.get(1)") #elseif($parts.size() > 2) #foreach($part in $parts) firstname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$part") || lastname.startsWithIgnoreCase("$part") || name.startsWithIgnoreCase("$part") || displayName.startsWithIgnoreCase("$part") #if($foreach.count < $parts.size()) || #end #end #end

Rule.name: Clear CustomGlobal

MonitoringStatistic.name: memoryUsage
MonitoringStatistic.Description: The amount of memory (in bytes) actively in use by the application server's Java virtual machine

MonitoringStatistic.name: memoryUsagePercentage
MonitoringStatistic.Description: The percentage of the maximum allowed memory which is actively in use by the application server's Java virtual machine

ServiceDefinition.name: SMListener
ServiceDefinition.Description: Service definition for the SM interceptor. Configure this by adding an "applications" attribute whose value is a csv of Application names that will be sending interception events. Be sure you also configure the ResourceEvent service to have a host.

ServiceDefinition.name: ResourceEvent
ServiceDefinition.Description: Service definition for the ResourceEvent processor. The attributes map contains the refresh options passed to the Identitizer. You can set "noRefresh" to "true" to disable refresh. This can run independent of SMListener and does not need to be on the same host. But if you're running SMListener, you need to be running this somewhere as well.

ServiceDefinition.name: Heartbeat
ServiceDefinition.Description: Service definition for the Heartbeat service. There is no configuration and you normally always have this enabled globally.

ServiceDefinition.name: Monitoring
ServiceDefinition.Description: Service definition for the Monitoring service. The "monitoringConfig" attribute entry serves as the default monitoring configuration for a Server if the Server does not have any monitoring configuration.

ServiceDefinition.name: Task
ServiceDefinition.Description: Service definition for the Task scheduler service.

ServiceDefinition.name: Request
ServiceDefinition.Description: Service definition for the Request processor service.

ServiceDefinition.name: PluginSync
ServiceDefinition.Description: Service definition for the plugins sync service.

ServiceDefinition.name: Reanimator
ServiceDefinition.Description: Service definition for the task/request re-animator service
